org.webcurator.domain
Interface TargetDAO

All Superinterfaces:
BaseDAO
All Known Implementing Classes:
TargetDAOImpl
public interface TargetDAO
extends BaseDAO

The TargetDAO provides access to targets, target groups and their related objects from the persistent store.

Author:
bbeaumont

delete, deleteAll, evict, initialize
 

Method Detail

saveAll

void saveAll(java.util.Collection collection)
Basic save all method. This will save all of the objects in the collection to the database but will perform nothing more than the Hibernate save/cascade logic. It should not be used to save a collection of targets or target groups.

Parameters:
collection - A collection of objects to be saved.

save

void save(Target aTarget)
Save the specified target to the persistent data store.

Parameters:
aTarget - the target to save

save

void save(Target aTarget,
          java.util.List<GroupMemberDTO> parents)
Save a target with it's parent associations.

Parameters:
aTarget - The target.
parents - The parents.

save

void save(Schedule aSchedule)
Save a schedule to the database.

Parameters:
aSchedule - The schedule to save.

getSchedulesToRun

java.util.List<Schedule> getSchedulesToRun()
Get schedules to re-run. This method will fully-populate the schedule, it's targets, and all child targets (recursively). This method exists specifically to retrieve the schedules that must be recalculated in order to populate the target instances xx days in advance.

Returns:
A list of schedules with their targets and child targets populated.

save

void save(TargetGroup aTargetGroup,
          boolean withChildren,
          java.util.List<GroupMemberDTO> parents)
Save a TargetGroup to the database.

Parameters:
aTargetGroup - The TargetGroup to save
withChildren - true to process the newChildren/removedChildren lists as well as saving the target group.
parents - The parents.

refresh

void refresh(java.lang.Object anObject)
Refresh a persisted object from the database. This is typically used after performing mass updates.

Parameters:
anObject - The object to refresh.

getTargetsForProfile

Pagination getTargetsForProfile(int pageNumber,
                                int pageSize,
                                java.lang.Long profileOid,
                                java.lang.String agencyName)
Search for targets that match the specified criteria.

Parameters:
pageNumber - the page number of the results to return
pageSize - the page size of the results to return
profileOid - The OID of a profile that returned targets must be using.
agencyName - agency that the target belongs to
Returns:
the page of results

search

Pagination search(int pageNumber,
                  int pageSize,
                  java.lang.Long searchOid,
                  java.lang.String targetName,
                  java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> states,
                  java.lang.String seed,
                  java.lang.String username,
                  java.lang.String agencyName,
                  java.lang.String memberOf,
                  boolean nondisplayonly,
                  java.lang.String sortorder)
Search for targets that match the specified criteria.

Parameters:
pageNumber - the page number of the results to return
pageSize - the page size of the results to return
searchOid - The OID to search for.
targetName - the name of the target
states - a list of states for the target
seed - the targets seed
username - the user that owns the target
agencyName - agency that the target belongs to
Returns:
the page of results

getSeeds

java.util.Set<Seed> getSeeds(TargetGroup aTarget,
                             java.lang.Long agencyOid,
                             java.lang.String subGroupTypeName)
Return the set of seeds for the specified target group and agency. Olnly seeds that belong to targets in the specified agency will be returned in the seed set.

Parameters:
aTarget - the target group to return the seeds for
agencyOid - the agency to return the seeds for
subGroupTypeName - the name of the sub group type
Returns:
the set of seeds
